verses.verse: (Praise to God in Creation and Redemption) Praise the LORD! Praise the name of the LORD; ((1 Tim. 2:8)) Praise Him, O you servants of the LORD!
(Ps. 113:1) You who stand in the house of the LORD, In (Luke 2:37) the courts of the house of our God,
Praise the LORD, for (Ps. 116:19) the LORD is good; Sing praises to His name, ((Ps. 119:68)) for it is pleasant.
For (Ps. 147:1) the LORD has chosen Jacob for Himself, Israel for His special treasure.
For I know that ((Ex. 19:5); Mal. 3:17; (Titus 2:14; 1 Pet. 2:9)) the LORD is great, And our Lord is above all gods.
(Ps. 95:3; 97:9) Whatever the LORD pleases He does, In heaven and in earth, In the seas and in all deep places.
(Ps. 115:3) He causes the vapors to ascend from the ends of the earth; (Jer. 10:13) He makes lightning for the rain; He brings the wind out of His (Job 28:25, 26; 38:24-28) treasuries.
(Jer. 51:16) He destroyed the firstborn of Egypt, Both of man and beast.
(Ex. 12:12; Ps. 78:51) He sent signs and wonders into the midst of you, O Egypt, (Ex. 7:10; Deut. 6:22; Ps. 78:43) Upon Pharaoh and all his servants.
(Ps. 136:15) He defeated many nations And slew mighty kings—
Sihon king of the Amorites, Og king of Bashan, And (Num. 21:24; Ps. 136:17) all the kingdoms of Canaan—
(Josh. 12:7-24) And gave their land as a heritage, A heritage to Israel His people.
(Ps. 78:55; 136:21, 22) Your name, O LORD, endures forever, Your fame, O LORD, throughout all generations.
((Ex. 3:15; Ps. 102:12)) For the LORD will judge His people, And He will have compassion on His servants.
(Deut. 32:36) The idols of the nations are silver and gold, The work of men’s hands.
They have mouths, but they do not speak; Eyes they have, but they do not see;
They have ears, but they do not hear; Nor is there any breath in their mouths.
Those who make them are like them; So is everyone who trusts in them.
((Ps. 115:4-8)) Bless the LORD, O house of Israel! Bless the LORD, O house of Aaron!
Bless the LORD, O house of Levi! You who fear the LORD, bless the LORD!
Blessed be the LORD ((Ps. 115:9)) out of Zion, Who dwells in Jerusalem! Praise the LORD!
